hadiths.text: Ali said:"A Hullah of Sira' was given to the Messenger of Allah [SAW] and he sent it to me. I put it on, then I saw anger in his face. He said: 'I did not give it to you to wear it.' Then he told me to divide it among my womenfolk

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الرُّخْصَةِ لِلنِّسَاءِ فِي لُبْسِ السِّيَرَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: Concession Allowing Women to Wear Sira'
